Uses of Package
com.exasol.jdbc

Classes in com.exasol.jdbc used by com.exasol.jdbc
AbstractEXAConnection
          Implements the main functionality required by the JDBC interface Connection.
AbstractEXAPreparedStatement
          Implements the main functionality required by the JDBC interface PreparedStatement.
AbstractEXAPreparedStatement_14
          Extends the abstract class AbstractEXAPreparedStatement providing JAVA version 1.4 specific functionality.
AbstractEXAStatement
          Implements the main functionality required by the JDBC interface Statement.
EXAConnection
          Extends the abstract class AbstractEXAConnection providing JAVA version specific functionality.
EXAResultSet
          Implements the JDBC interfaces ResultSetMetaData and ResultSet.
EXAStatement
          Extends the abstract class AbstractEXAStatement providing JAVA version specific functionality.
